summary: Implements a diffusion pipeline for the Kandinsky‑3 model that transforms textual prompts into images, managing prompt tokenization, text encoding, latent preparation, classifier‑free guidance, and iterative denoising using the UNet, VQ‑VAE, and scheduler components.
business_intent: Offer developers a ready‑to‑use API for high‑quality text‑to‑image generation, enabling integration of AI‑driven visual content creation into applications and supporting model fine‑tuning via LoRA adapters.
